TableInfo.QueryValue: select a.bps_function, a.bps_key_field, e.bps_key_value, d.fo_key, d.fo_field, d.fo_field_type, d.bps_field, d.fo_field_value, d.operator, d.valexp, a.fo_idx_table, a.bps_account_type, a.bps_account, d.alternative_value from hft_mapper a, hft_mapper_ext e, hft_mapper_detail d where a.bps_key_field is not null and a.bps_key_field = e.bps_key_field(+) and nvl(a.return_id, e.fo_key) = d.fo_key union all select a.bps_function, a.bps_key_field, '' bps_key_value, d.fo_key, d.fo_field, d.fo_field_type, d.bps_field, d.fo_field_value, d.operator, d.valexp, a.fo_idx_table, a.bps_account_type, a.bps_account, d.alternative_value from hft_mapper a, hft_mapper_detail d where a.return_id = d.fo_key
select cdtype || '.' || cdname as key, cdval, cdcontent, en_cdcontent from allcode

select c.custid, c.custodycd, a.acctno afacctno from afmast a, cfmast c where a.custid = c.custid and a.isfo = 'Y' union all select tlid custid, tlid custodycd, tlid acctno from tlprofiles where tlid <>'0686'

select CA.AFACCTNO, CA.camastid,a.exprice,ca.pqtty,af.corebank from camast a, caschd ca, afmast af where ca.camastid=a.camastid AND af.acctno = ca.afacctno and ca.afacctno= :p_account AND ca.camastid||to_char(ca.autoid) = :p_camastid
